commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basa6c5f1b"

diff:
"a6c5f1b Bug 284379: Enabling middlemouse.contentLoadURL and middle clicking a tab should still close tab, patch by Adam Guthrie <ispiked@gmail.com>, r=rob_strong
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index 124bb534..c314e4d 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -755,8 +755,7 @@
         <parameter name="event"/>
         <body>
           <![CDATA[
-            if (event.button != 1 || event.target.localName != 'tab' ||
-                this.mPrefs.getBoolPref("middlemouse.contentLoadURL"))
+            if (event.button != 1 || event.target.localName != 'tab')
               return;
 
             this.removeTab(event.target);
"
